nodes.text: Jabba's demolition games were dangerous sporting events created by Jabba Desilijic Tiure, the Hutt crime lord of Tatooine, at some point toward the end of the Galactic Civil War. Since the Galactic Empire had outlawed podracing, an important source of income for the Hutt, Jabba devised an underground demolition contest that pitted various participants and their vehicles against each other.
